transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir, main Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART ke office se. Baat hui thi na IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir, wohi pollution control consultancy wali jo category hai woh aapki B rank mein ho rakhi hai, abhi boost ho rahi hai. Bola tha maine aapko ki uske liye aap iski inquiry ko revert kariye, still us pe kuch bhi update nahi hai sir.
Customer: Ah.
Executive: Ji. Actually woh share karte hai na hamara yeh.
Customer: Ah IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Kaun kar raha hai? Kaun kar raha hai sir?
Customer: Taufik ji, Taufik Taufik.
Executive: Toh aap unka number ya woh mujhe batayenge like kya unka number yeh secondary wala hai last mein 764 wala?
Customer: Woh nahi hai, woh chutti par hai.
Executive: Toh fir kaise pata chal payega ki kis se call karna hai sir?
Customer: Haan boliye na kya hai.
Executive: Aap kaise use karte hai mujhe batayenge mobile se ki system se?
Customer: System se.
Executive: System se, abhi aap system pe hi ho payenge?
Customer: Ek minute, main login karta hu.
Executive: Ji ji ji, aapki mail ID bhi hogi aapke system pe?
Customer: Hmm haan.
Executive: Ah jo official mail ID hai just a second yeh shrichakrapani.env@gmail.com wali?
Customer: Woh nahi login dusra hai, info@shrichakrapani.
Executive: Achha aur yeh jo whatsapp wala number hai yeh aapke paas hoga?
Customer: Whatsapp wala.
Executive: Aapke laptop mein whatsapp hoga sir?
Customer: Haan haan hai na, par dusra number hai.
Executive: Ah aap mujhe woh dusra number wala whatsapp batayenge apna jo aapke laptop mein hoga?
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: 7796.
Executive: Just a second. 7796.
Customer: 779604.
Executive: 04.
Customer: 16.
Executive: 16.
Customer: 81.
Executive: 81. Okay, aap dekho aapko isse mera hike ka message mila whatsapp pe?
Customer: Haan haan mil gaya.
Executive: Ah ji. Aur abhi aapke is pe isi whatsapp pe maine aapko ek link share kiya hua hai google meet ka woh mila aapko?
Customer: Yes yes mil gaya.
Executive: Toh aap sir isko bhi join kar lijiye aur IndiaMART bhi aapne open kiya toh hum yeh video meet pe discuss karke main aapko pura show kara deti hu na kya cheez kaise sahi hogi aur abhi kya is pe required hai. It will take max five to six minutes sir, isse zyada nahi lagega.
Customer: Okay, theek hai.
Executive: Ji, aapke dono category. Haan haan aap kariye. Aapke dono category deboost ho rahi hai, doctor testing bhi pollution control consultancy bhi.
Customer: Zara right side mein check bas leta hu.
Executive: Haan aap kariye, main batati hu aapko on call. Toh join kar lijiye meeting se and then.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan sir main bol rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai, bas ek minute.
Executive: IndiaMART ka kaunsa number hai?
Customer: 003 wala hai yeh sir.
Executive: Sir open ho gaya?
Customer: Haan haan ho gaya.
Executive: Haan woh meeting jo maine aapko whatsapp pe link share kiya hua hai usko join kar lijiye click karke. Ek baar aapko shayad kuch revert karna hoga waha pe whatsapp pe. Ah tab link clickable hoga I guess, pehle nahi hoga. Ek baar aap check kar lijiye link pe click ho raha hai?
Executive: Yes sir, aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Ah ek second. Aap jo hai na sir apni screen share kariye.
Executive: Ji ji mujhe sir aapke system pe woh mic toh on hoga na?
Customer: Haan mic toh on hai.
Executive: Toh hum ek hi jagah connect kar lete hai isse woh voice ka bhi issue aayega aur isse bhi problem aayegi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap aapko aa raha hai mera aawaz?
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aapki aawaz mujhe aa. Nahi ah haan sir just a second. Ah meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's pollution control consultancy category is deboosting.

- Customer unable to login to IndiaMART account.

- Customer having issue connecting to the meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a Google Meet link on WhatsApp.

- Executive provided the WhatsApp number to connect.

- Executive guided the customer to join the meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will discuss the issue on Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- deboosting, google meet, whatsapp, login
